name: Greed Coin
description:
A rogue AI named SKREEN.EXE created a game to show off their Cyrpto currency to lure in Greedy suckers to collect.

This game was made for the Weightgaming.com Gain Jam 2022.

All art assets are drawn by me.

SKREEN.EXE Voice acting is performed by me.

Music sourced from: Tension | Royalty Free Music - Pixabay
